game.name: DCS: Black Shark 2 Pandemic Campaign
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 캡션 이용 가능, VR 지원, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 레벨 에디터 포함
game.shortDescription: In August 2020, terrorist gangs, taking advantage of the turbulent internal political situation in the Islamic Republic of Iran, invaded its territory and occupied part of the country. The Iranian government has requested military assistance from the Russian Federation.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In August 2020, terrorist gangs, taking advantage of the turbulent internal political situation in the Islamic Republic of Iran, invaded its territory and occupied part of the country. The Iranian government has requested military assistance from the Russian Federation.
